topics.body:
So what's the deal with nobody wanting people to sell porn? Patreon doesn't allow it, PayPal doesn't allow it, I can't imagine Google payments or Amazon payments allow it either.
 Can't an honest pornographer make a living?
topics.author: 500b587e7f123b1f230014a9

topics.body:
. . . . I'm reading the news; I *really really really* can't wait for a decade from now cause I'm getting tired of all the utter fucking stupidity of 24/7 news and pseudo intellectualism that worship their ideological beliefs like a god.  If you're wondering what I mean by the latter I mean the sorts of people who believe that their ideals are fundamentally absolute truth and that anything that contradicts their ideology must be "corrected"; basically like the people who believe vaccines cause autism or such.


Shit that is coming out in the next decade that is going to fundamentally change society from the ground up:
Cheap androids, sexbots, VR, self driving cars, algae biofuel, actual cyborgs, ectogenesis, gene therapy, nanoparticles that could theoretically end viruses all together no more hiv nothing, computer chips that emulate brain cells receiving widespread adoption, potentially the introduction of asteroid mining, 3D printing, information and data being stored smaller than the atomic level, quantum computing, transistors the size of atoms, completion of the blue brain project, artificial dna enzymes widespread adoption, almost every person on the earth has internet connection, real time accurate language translations, widespread tourist space travel, synthesized food potentially might end global hunger, oil no longer able to compete.

Each and everyone one of these things would potentially change society as much or more than how much say the internet has; now let's imagine if even a fourth of these things come true.
"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5497e64863687207dc400800#post_5497e64863687207dc400800
[bq="Too_Offensive"]So what's the deal with nobody wanting people to sell porn? Patreon doesn't allow it, PayPal doesn't allow it, I can't imagine Google payments or Amazon payments allow it either.
 Can't an honest pornographer make a living?[/bq]
Cause the anti-sex movement keeps rebranding themselves every five years to make it sound like they're not fucking morons and the current trend is to try to force people to not be able to make money off the porn they make.

"Hey guys; if we rebrand ourselves maybe no one will think we're idiots anymore"
"Hey guys; if we rebrand ourselves maybe no one will think we're idiots anymore"
"Hey guys; if we rebrand ourselves maybe no one will think we're idiots anymore"
"Hey guys; if we rebrand ourselves maybe no one will think we're idiots anymore"
"Hey guys; if we rebrand ourselves maybe no one will think we're idiots anymore"
"Hey guys; if we rebrand ourselves maybe no one will think we're idiots anymore"
"Hey guys; if we rebrand ourselves maybe no one will think we're idiots anymore"
"Hey guys; if we rebrand ourselves maybe no one will think we're idiots anymore"
Have I ever told you the definition of insanity?
